modName: Immersive Buyable Skyforge Weapons - aMidianBorn Compatible
summary: Always wanted to use the Skyforge Weapons but you havn\'t completed the Companions quest? Well, now you can!
descriptionHtml:
[color=#1E7FCB][size=14]Description[/size][/color]
Always wanted to use the Skyforge Weapons but you havn\'t completed the Companions quest? Always wondered why everyone says Eorlund Gray-Mane is the best smith in Skyrim even if he sells the weapon that makes his reputation only to Companions?  Wonder no more, now you can!


Eorlund Gray-Mane will now sell Skyforge Weapons but you\'ll 1rst have to persuade Eorlund to sell Skyforge Weapons and then, persuade him again to get a discount. He is voice acted and use is own voice so it\'s [u]not immersion breaking[/u]. If you finish Companions, you get a new dialogue. You\'ll get vanilla prices (very low) as usual and the other sets will be removed.

First of all, [color=#1E7FCB]you need to be Lvl 15[/color] to be able to persuade him. There\'s [color=#1E7FCB]2 way to persuade Eorlund[/color]. The 1rst way is related to [color=#1E7FCB]Main Quest[/color] and I\'ll let you find which quest is required to persuade him. The other way is with [color=#00CC00]Speechcraft[/color], you need to be [color=#00CC00]Lvl 25[/color] the first time and [color=#00CC00]Lvl 40[/color] for the discounts. 
[color=#FFCC00]Defaults prices[/color] are [color=#FFCC00]Elven[/color] and [color=#FF9900]Discounted[/color] are [color=#FF9900]Dwarven[/color].

[b][color=#FFCC00]Please endorse![/color] [color=#FF9900]It helps more than you think![/color][/b] 


[color=#FF0000]**Known minor bug[/color] : If you look at Eorlunds selling list and than activate the dialogue, the new weapons won\'t be added to the list immediately. You have to wait for his list to change. Wait for 30 hours should be ok.


[color=#1E7FCB][size=14]Versions and Compatibilities[/size][/color]

[color=#1E7FCB][b]\'\'Main file\'\'[/b][/color]  aint compatible with any mod that changes properties of Skyforge weapons. 

[u]The  2 patches below requires the Main File![/u]

[color=#1E7FCB][b]\'\'Amidianborn Patch\'\'[/b][/color]  requires [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34147//?] Wolf and Skyforge Weapons [/url] V2.0 since his latest version is not on Book Of Silence yet.

[color=#1E7FCB][b]\'\'Skyforge Weapon Patch\'\'[/b][/color] requires [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/36815//?]Skyforge Weapon[/url]. For now, Eorlund will sell only standard Steel Skyforge Weapons.




[b][color=#1E7FCB]Credit[/color][/b] 
The screenshots were taken with RCRN, Dynavision and Amidianborn Textures. 
Also, a big thanks to [u]ThresherMaw[/u] for his help for compatibility and [u]EmeraldReign[/u] for his help with scripts.
author: AcMaiden

files.name: Default Version
files.changelogHtml:
Now weapons are temperable
Reworked the LvlList so you always get the 5 weapons + 50% chance of having 1 extra 1Hand weapon for each kind
Made AMB Patch compatible with his 2.0 Version. Reworked the LvlList same as above, but always get the 8 weapons + 50% chance of having 25 extra Skyforge Arrows
If you finish the proper Companion quest, the ''vanilla price'' skyforge weapons will be sold

files.name: Main
files.changelogHtml:
You will now have to persuade Eorlund to sell you Skyforge Weapons
You can persuade him again to get a discount
If you have finished the companions, you have access to a dialogue to get ''Vanilla Price Skyforge Weapons'' as you would have usually. If you had a set active (''Default Price'' or ''Discounted Price'') it will now be removed
The default prices has changed to Elven
